title: Pricing One-Pager
text: Our pricing is value-based with tiers for SMB, MM, and ENT. Discounts apply for annual terms. Competitive vs enterprise bundles when factoring integration and time-to-value.

title: Security & Compliance FAQ
text: We support SSO, SCIM, SOC2 Type II, and provide audit logs. Enterprise customers can provision fine-grained roles.

title: ROI Case Studies
text: Customers report 25% faster onboarding and 15% lower total cost of ownership after consolidating tools with our platform.
